## RefreshTokenService.refreshToken() method

Refresh the access token bound with the given refresh token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refreshToken(refreshToken: string): Promise<TokenObject>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  refreshToken | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
